mapper.select: SELECT b.businessName ,i.invoiceCode ,i.mainBusinessCode ,i.invoiceType ,i.supplyBusinessCode ,i.supplyManagerId ,i.demandBusinessCode ,i.demandManagerId ,i.invoicePrice ,i.invoiceTax ,i.totalPrice ,i.issueStatus ,i.payMethod ,i.invoiceConfirm ,i.briefs ,i.issueDate ,i.regDate FROM k1_tb_invoice AS i INNER JOIN k1_tb_main_business AS b ON i.mainBusinessCode = b.mainBusinessCode;

SELECT i.invoiceCode ,i.mainBusinessCode ,i.invoiceType ,i.supplyBusinessCode ,i.supplyManagerId ,i.demandBusinessCode ,i.demandManagerId ,i.invoicePrice ,i.invoiceTax ,i.totalPrice ,i.issueStatus ,i.payMethod ,i.invoiceConfirm ,i.briefs ,i.issueDate ,i.regDate ,d.invoiceDetailCode ,d.lsAccountCode ,d.totalAccountCode ,d.salesTsCode ,d.itemCode ,d.amount ,d.unitPrice ,d.supplyPrice ,d.tax ,d.`comment` FROM k1_tb_invoice AS i INNER JOIN k1_tb_invoice_detail AS d ON i.invoiceCode = d.invoiceCode WHERE i.invoiceCode = #{invoiceCode};
